ovdesc.p: Definition of new product groups which can be used within SEAT.SCRIPTS. For instance TREASURY is a product group under which the scripts for the applications MONEY MARKET, FOREX, FRA.DEALS etc., can be defined.

desc.p: Description of the purpose of the script. This should cover the very purpose for which this script is used for testing. Between 3 and 35 characters allowed, no special editing will be done.
This id is used to specify the T24 modules.This ID will be used in SEAT.SCRIPTS application in PRODUCT.GROUP field.Mandatory field, maximum of 16 characters allowed.
